sentences.english: So I included Rieann in my Powa service.
sentences.chinese: 因此我将她加进颇瓦超度之列。

sentences.english: Anything rise beyond that could trigger climate catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 任何超度的增长都会引发气候灾难。

sentences.english: Clerical Yuye released release souls from purgatory successfully the soul of the cummer before the client.

sentences.english: A farmer requested a Tendai priest to recite sutras for his wife, who had died.
sentences.chinese: 农夫死了妻子，邀请天台宗师傅给她念经超度。

sentences.english: A love investment then is lives with surpassing which dies.
sentences.chinese: 一次爱的投入便是一次生与死的超度。

sentences.english: I'm bound to ease a Rendon patient out of the world.
sentences.chinese: 一个病人超度到另一个世界去。
又一个夜晚，又一次超度。
